attributes.action: remove art and all art based sublects from the national curriculum for KS3.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The subject of art is wasting the time of academic pupils who could better use the time to study academic subjects. Other expressive arts such as Music and PE have academic elements art has none. So Art wastes the time of students who are gifted. Art teaches students nothing about life and the skills learnt will have no use in later life inless you decide for a career in art.
